profile:
Our goal is to keep our nation's capital beautiful!

With the help of our amazing clients, Empire provides gorgeous exterior makeovers to wonderful homes across the city. 

Thank you to everyone who has been part of our goal.
services:
- Decks (Composite, PVC, Cedar, Pressure-treated)
- Landscaping
- Interlocking 
- Hardscape
- Stonework
- Woodwork
- Railings 
- Glass railings
- Lighting
brands:
Composite Decks: TruNorth, Fiberon, Timbertech, Trex

PVC Deck: Azek

Interlock: Techo-Bloc, Permacon Banas...
specialities:
- Architectural Design
- Composite & PVC decks
- Cedar & pressure-treated decks
- Glass railings
- Interlocking
- Landscaping
payment_method: Cheque, Credit Card, Cash, E-transfer, Financing
diplomas: Construction, Civil and Chemical Engineering, Architectural Technologist, Commerce
warranty_terms: 5-year on workmanship for decks and fences. 2-year for interlock. Manufacturer's warranty applies for all materials.
name: Empire Deck, Fence & Interlock

profile:
Elieâ€™s Fencing Solutions is very proud to serve our Ottawa clients. Our goal is to work with our customers to design the best solution that will meet their needs.
***
We specialize in the installation and repairs of residential and commercial fences including; Iron, Cedar, Pressure Treated, Vinyl (PVC), Simtek and Chain link. We also specialize in building custom decks, and railings.

We provide a free estimate where we will sit down with you and design your fence and deck and help you select the style that best suits your budget and all your needs. We keep our customers updated so they know when we start the project and when we finish.

We are your Ottawa Backyard Specialists to build you the luxury and comfort you've been dreaming of!


Call us today at 613-852-2522 to book your free estimate or you can also email us at freeestimates@eliesfencing.com

 
Our Business hours are Monday to Friday from 8 am till 5 pm 
Saturday from 10 am till 3 pm 
Sunday and holidays closed
products: PVC, PRESSURE TREATED, CEDAR, IRON, SIMTEK, CHAIN LINK
services:
Build and repair fences,
Custom made decks,
Custom made railings,
Basement Renovations

profile:
Forefront Fencing is a family-owned and operated PVC fence installation services business located in Ottawa. We are dedicated to professionalism and customer satisfaction. We are specialize in installing PVC fences. We offer free estimates and guarantee our workmanship for all of our Ottawa/Gatineau PVC Fence installations.

Ottawa Forefront Fencing is becoming a leader in distributing, installing, and wholesaling fences for homeowners, contractors, and businesses throughout the Ottawa/Gatineau regions. We also offer professional services for Vinyl Fence Installation & Repairs.
